activity.bestPlaces: Flowers Market (Also Princep Ghat, Millennium Park)
activity.description: While the flower market is vibrant in the morning, sunset views are best at riverside spots. This activity description is more suited to a place like Princep Ghat or Millennium Park, where you can watch the sun set over the Hooghly River.
A classic, old-world experience of riding in a horse-drawn carriage around the sprawling grounds of the Victoria Memorial.
essentials: Camera, comfortable clothes, and money for the ride.

activity.description: A sprawling urban park with a variety of themed gardens and recreational activities, including a "Seven Wonders of the World" replica section, boating, and cycling.
essentials: Wear comfortable shoes, carry a water bottle, and a hat or sunglasses.

activity.description: A bustling hub of restaurants, pubs, and shops. It's famous for its vibrant nightlife and diverse culinary scene.
essentials: Dress code for specific clubs, money for dining and entertainment.

activity.bestPlaces: Anywhere as you choice (Various routes, e.g., Shyambazar to Esplanade)
activity.description: Experience the last operational tram network in India. A slow, nostalgic journey through the city's bustling streets, offering a unique perspective of Kolkata's daily life.
essentials: Check the route map, carry a water bottle, and have a camera ready.

activity.bestPlaces: Princep Ghat (Also Millennium Park, Howrah Ghat)
activity.description: A ferry ride on the Hooghly River provides a unique vantage point to see the city. You can enjoy stunning views of the Howrah Bridge and Vidyasagar Setu.
essentials: A small amount of cash for the ticket, and a camera.

activity.description: One of the oldest and largest cricket stadiums in India. The atmosphere during a match, especially an international one, is electrifying.
essentials: Check for match schedules and book tickets in advance. Carry essentials like a hat, sunglasses, and water.

activity.bestPlaces: Aqua - The Park (Also other venues on Park Street)
activity.description: A popular poolside lounge bar known for its luxurious and vibrant ambiance. A great place to relax by the pool, enjoy drinks, and socialize.
essentials: Smart casual or upscale attire may be required.
